alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 22 at 5:44PM MST until August 22 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 630 PM MST. * At 543 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Picacho Peak State Park, or 22 miles northwest of Marana, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. Areas of blowing dust with reduced visibilities are also accompanying this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eloy, Picacho and Picacho Peak State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
